column5: Wifey and I just got back from Niagara [Golden Horseshoe], where we celebrated our "Golden" Anniversary  Had a great time, and decided that I would'nt want to change a thing.
Congratulations to both of you and welcome to the club.
Congratulations to you and Jackie my friend. You're both fine people and such a great asset to our community. Love and respect IS a wonderful thing isn't it? Be well my friend.
Jackie must be a good woman to tolerate you for that long  Debbe and I hit 24 years a month ago....gotta long way to go to the 50 CLUB.  Congrats to you both !!!
I'm just hoping to live for 50 years... the thought of my wife putting up with me for 50 years seems unattainable. Congratulations to you both! -Brian

wow definately a great achievement together  , next time you happen to be in the area and not going to skip out on any celebrations that might get you in trouble, shoot me a PM if ya want to get any news on what's happeneing fishing wize, I can steer you to a few good places no problemo
Thats quite a milestone for sure. Congrats on 50 years done right!!!
Congratulations Jack and Jackie!
Congratulations and may others follow your lead.
Congrats to you Jack for you're golden, may you have many more happy years with Jackie
See what happens when you do what your told Jack.LOL Congrats.
Good Job Jackie on keepin the "old Goat" around I wish you both many more.....  Art
Quite the milestone there Jack!!!! Congrats to you both!!  Maureen
Way to Go...Jack and Jackie !!!  And a Happy Birthday to the Missus also...
Hey, that's a BIG one, super-congrats!!
Wishing you and Jackie many more ! Joe
All the best Jack and Jackie and congrats on your 50th, hope had a great time celebrating the happy occasion!!  Sincerely, 1leg
Congratulations to both of you  Tomorrow will be our 19th.....looks like 50 is long way to go...but working on it  Again congratulations!! and wishing you many more!! Leechman
Congratulations to the pair of you Jack & Jackie, that's something to be very proud of !!  Diane and I will be seeking admission the the 1/2 century club in 8 more years
Fabulous news.  Congratulations to the bose of yews.  That's Teamwork, and a true testament to your love and commitment.
